r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Changed - Clean up generate-final-artifact.sh #1442
### Fixed - Replace direct access of meta/metrics zvals by safe array access in most places #1440 - Always separate meta and metrics arrays on access #1441 - Bump profiling to v0.3.0-rc.6 (fixes some linking bugs) #1444
